General.Name: Simple Mart Retail Co Ltd
General.Description: Simple Mart Retail Co., Ltd. engages in the operation of supermarkets in Taiwan. It is also involved in the retailing of various foods, beverages, daily commodities, etc.; and home shopping and organic products. Simple Mart Retail Co., Ltd. was incorporated in 2003 and is based in Taipei, Taiwan. Simple Mart Retail Co., Ltd. operates as a subsidiary of Mercuries & Associates Holding Ltd.
General.Address: No. 4, Minquan East Road, Taipei, Taiwan
